item.description:
The Farmington Library will be showing the film "L'Enfant" which was produced in Belgium a couple of years ago. In French with subtitles. It comes highly recommended. There were be an introduction by Lieve Keeney, who is well-known for her French/Belgian lectures in the area. No charge.The library is in the same complex as the police station, just off route 4 near the high school. Let's fill the auditorium with Francophones!
If anyone wants to stop for a dessert/discussion afterwards, the restaurant Apricots, on the Farmington River, is across the road.

group.name: The West Hartford Groupe de French

item.name: Free Film Showing
